message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. I'm offering the product to you for $12,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $12,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer of $9,000. I understand that's a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm now offering the product to you for $11,000. This is my best price, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. $11,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.  It's a fair price considering your asking price and my budget.

Hi Bob, I see you're still a bit hesitant on the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit. I'm now offering the product to you for $10,500. This is my final compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a reasonable deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $10,500 is still a bit high, but I'm willing to go up to $10,000. This is a fair price that benefits both of us, and I'm confident you can make a good profit.
